title: KCET
content: Is PES a centre for KCET as there are some doubts on this subreddit ?

comments.body:
I think this sub gives good replies to KCET related questions, and I don't think there's any other subreddit that does the same 

A side hustle of PESU Sub ig
I see but is PES still a KCET centre ?
Idts, but if it is I'd bet it's the best one there is
No cap my centre was shit :(
I'm not sure about PESU, but PES PU (HN Campus) is a centre for KCET
Yeah I gave my CET last year jn HN campus
